$* declaracion de variables *$
DECVAR
                             a1 : FLOAT
                             b2 : INT
                             p : INT
ENDDECVAR

$* seccion de programa *$
PROGRAM.SECTION
                             a1 = 45.0
                             b2 = 10
                             p = 10

                             IF (b2 == p) 
                                  THEN (p = 5)
                             ELSE p = b2 * 2
                             ENDIF
	
                             $*comentario*$
	
                             SHOW "hola mundoaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa"
                             SHOW 99999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999.999999999999999999999999999999999999
                             SHOW var
                             SHOW 0hFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF
                             SHOW 99999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999

                             SHOW "hola mundo"
                             SHOW 99.99
                             SHOW var
                             SHOW 0hFF
                             SHOW 99
  
                             REPEAT 10
                                 IF (ALLEQUAL([a+w,b],[(d-3)*2,e],[g,h])) 
                                     THEN SHOW "AllEqual es verdadero" 
                                 ENDIF  	
ENDPROGRAM.SECTION
